Description: Consume organic and homemade food rich in vitamins, minerals, and protein
Drink adequate water to stay hydrated
Walking helps control blood sugar and keeps body active
Take iron, calcium, and folic acid supplements
Choose fruits, salads, soups, and steamed vegetables
Consume protein-rich foods for fetal growth
Include calcium-rich foods for bone development
Stay physically active with safe exercises
Avoid raw or undercooked meat and eggs
Consume yogurt, nuts, seeds for calcium and magnesium
Consume whole grains and fiber-rich foods
